'Abdank' is a Polish coat of arms. It was used by several szlachta families in
the times of the Kingdom of Poland and the Polish-Lithuanian
Commonwealth. Paprocki, Bartosz. Herby Rycerstwa Polskiego, 1584, p. 216-
229 Niesiecki, Kasper. Herbarz Polski, 1839
